name: The ring of illusionary protection
data: It increases the users intelligence somewhat.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a bit.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'quick shielding'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'mastery of illusion'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'shielding control'.
